title: Bi-Weekly Career and Hiring Discussion Thread
selftext:
Hello r/india! If you need any suggestions/help regarding your career, ask here. If your company is hiring or if you are looking for a job, then post here.

**If You or Your Company is Hiring:**

1. Name of the company
2. Location
3. Requirements
4. Preferred way of contacting you

**If You are looking to get hired**

1. Your skillset/experience
2. Portfolio (if any/applicable)
3. Location
4. Preferred way of contacting you

Please do not mention your emails. You can/should prefer to take conversation forward in PMs instead to avoid any privacy mishaps.

Do follow up here with your experience. Did you get a job or hire someone successfully via these threads? Your feedback helps!

**Career Thread is posted every two weeks on Thursday mornings |** [**Old Threads**](https://reddit.com/r/india/search?q=Career+and+Hiring+thread&restrict_sr=on&sort=new&t=all)

https://preview.redd.it/osdztmrfx8n61.png?width=1487&format=png&auto=webp&s=dab56a83877ffe7dc6fd93767a8f63e9c366e592
comments: Completed 3 years of unemployment today.

Looking to get hired after getting laid off by vedantu.

1). R, SQL, Excel, Tableau, Data Studio.
2). 1 years and 9 months of experience as an analyst.
3). Ludhiana
4). PM me, I'll share you the resume.

I'm looking for the roles as an analyst preferably buisness analyst...but I'll take up data analyst role too.

Thank you so much in advance!

Looking to get into associate/junior Devops role, am a really quick learner. I'm knowledgeable in ansible, k8s, Linux, AWS, terraform, docker, git and python.  Please DM for resume, any location would be fine

Looking for a contract analyst job. I have 2 years pqe in similar contract drafting, contract management and contract abstraction roles. 

I am a quick learner and have a great academic record from an NLU. Also I am ready to join immediately.

Looking for Internship/full time for fresher in  Frontend Roles (React JS)

1. JavaScript, React
2. Will dm 
3. Any big city in India preferably Blr.
4.DM
Saw this in the Hyd AWS user group - Hi All, Infinity Learn is looking to hire AWS DevOps Professionals, with a 2/3 years experience.
Starting/started a business?
No.
Completed 5 years of unemployment.
ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­
There's a hyd AWS user group? Can you please give me a link to it? Also thank you very much
Check it out on Meetup - the app/website.
Hey, is there any service provider in India that supplies custom-made tri-blend t-shirts?

Recent business administration graduate with training in various management fields, looking for a head start across domain and expand my field, seeking opportunities in diverse sectors. 

Open to any type of work opportunity|Internship|Project etc. Remote only. 

Please Dm
Holy shit I was unemployed for 7 months that too during the pandemic as I graduated at that time and those 7 months were just pure hell for me, I really can't imagine 5 years :/
I am fine as long as I have money to sustain myself.
How

Instagram : PrimeLogoZ

Freelance Logo Designer

Looking for a job in marketing sector. 
BBA in marketing. 
Doing a course on Digital marketing
Kolkata preferably but no problem in relocating
DM me we can then move forward.

Hi. I am someone trying to crack his first Data Analyst role.

 Can I DM you some questions?
Sure! Please!

>Sure! Please!

sure?

I'm looking for remote junior frontend developer roles (REACTJs)

My DM is open.
Any chance you'd be interested in Angular?
Yes yes
DM me your resume and I'll send it to our recruiting folks.
You can find few on [metana.io](https://metana.io)
